article.title: Schafer Corporation Receives Research and Development Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Schafer Corporation is being awarded a $10 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for research and development associated with directed energy and electric weapon systems. Aspects of the research and development effort to be procured include technology assessment, engineering, engineering analysis, design and design analysis, and test and evaluation for all manners of directed energy systems and subsystems.
